Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) radiant damage. Claw. Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage. Tail. Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. The dragon targets a creature it can see within 120 feet of it and attempts to send that creature to a dream plane.
